item.title: By: Lucas Martin
item.dc:creator: Lucas Martin
item.description: Thanks a lot Dr. Shock, recently it's got to a point where I even felt anxiety coz of my phone. I'd study and immediately look at my social media after a few questions, with the same thought process as you have indicated. Then I'd start panicking because by the end of the day I would not have covered as much as I initially wanted to and the test date looms even closer. A few days ago I decided to just stop my social media presence completely and I feel much more productive and confident in my level of knowledge. Thanks for this article, it reinforces my new belief system with some great info and tips

item.title: By: kandrnorthamerica2012
item.dc:creator: kandrnorthamerica2012
item.description: I don't know if it works for all other subjects but I find that the most satisfying thing in art is to find problems in producing effects I want and finally working out a solution. Sometimes it takes me years but it is the best part of painting for me. The satisfaction of finding the solutions.
